      Methods in logic with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Map.hasReachedLever(Character c)
      Checks if Character c current position is the same as a Unlocker.
      boolean Character.isCaptured(Character c)
      Checks if this Character and character c (in the possibility of having a weapon) are in capturing proximity (distance minor or equal to one unit).
      boolean Drunken.isCaptured(Character c)
      Checks if this Drunken and character c are in capturing proximity.
      boolean Map.isExitColliding(Character c)
      Checks if Character c current position is the same as a Door.
      boolean Weapon.isHit(Character c)
      Checks if this Weapon and character c are in hitting proximity (distance minor or equal to one unit).
      boolean Map.isWallColliding(Character c)
      Checks if Character c current position is the same as an impassable object.
      boolean Map.isWeaponColliding(Character c)
      Checks if Weapon current position of Character c is the same as an impassable object or a Unlocker.
      void Map.placeCharacter(Character c)
      Places character on this Map map.
      void Map.placeCharacter(Character c, char s)
      Places character on this Map map with symbol s
      void Map.removeCharacter(Character c)
      Removes character on this Map map.
